00046 
00047 uvm_ml_packer::uvm_ml_packer() {
00048   uvm_packer::use_metadata(true);
00049 }
00050 
00051 uvm_ml_packer::~uvm_ml_packer() { }
00052 
00053 bool uvm_ml_packer::use_metadata() const {
00054   return uvm_packer::use_metadata();
00055 }
00056 
00057 void uvm_ml_packer::use_metadata(bool b) {
00058   if (!b) {
00059     cerr << "WARNING: uvm_ml_packer use_metadata must be true. " 
00060       << "Ignoring attempt to set it to false" << endl;
00061     return;
00062   }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void uvm_ml_packer::set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
00066   set_size(v->size/32);
00067   int size = get_size();
00068   sc_bv_base btmp(size);
00069   int nwords = btmp.size(); // # words that will fit in size bits
00070   sc_bv_base* bv = get_packed_bits();
00071   for (int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) {
00072     bv->set_word(i, *(v->val + i));
00073   }
00074   set_pack_index(nwords);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void uvm_ml_packer::fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
00078   v->size = get_pack_index() * 32;
00079   sc_bv_base* bv = get_packed_bits();
00080   int size = get_size();
00081   sc_bv_base btmp(size);
00082   int bsize = btmp.size(); // # words that will fit in size bits
00083 
00084   // this mlupo is going over to backplane and then onto SV adaptor;
00085   // the SV adaptor is hardcoded to accept the max bits, hence allocate
00086   // max words here
00087 
00088   static int nwords = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words();
00089 
00090   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(v, nwords);
00091 
00092   for (int i = 0; i < bsize; i++) {
00093     *(v->val + i) = bv->get_word(i);
00094   }
00095 }

00106 // NOTE: unlimited max size 
00107 // memory is allocated dynamically in chunks of 
00108 // unsigned(UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT)

00125 class ml_uvm_packer_rep_int {
00126 public:
00127   ml_uvm_packer_rep_int(uvm_packer* packer);
00128   ~ml_uvm_packer_rep_int();
00129   //
00130   void allocate(int nwords, bool copy = true);
00131   void reset();
00132   void set_bits(unsigned* bits, unsigned nbits);
00133   //
00134   bool use_metadata() const { return m_use_metadata; }
00135   void use_metadata(bool b) { m_use_metadata = b; }
00136   //
00137   void check_size(int nwords);
00138   //
00139   void pack_non_null();
00140   bool unpack_non_null();
00141   void pack_null();

00143   void pack_char(char);
00144   void unpack_char(char&);
00145   //

00154   void unpack_obj(uvm_object*&);
00155   //
00156   void pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic&);
00157   void unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic&);
00158   void pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base&);
00159   void unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base&);
00160   void pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base&);
00161   void unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base&);
00162   void pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base&);
00163   void unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base&);
00164   void pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base&);
00165   void unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base&);
00166   void pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed&);
00167   void unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed&);
00168   void pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned&);
00169   void unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned&);
00170   //
00171   unsigned get_remaining_unpacked_bits() { return (pack_index - unpack_index) * 32; }
00172   unsigned* get_packed_bits() { return m_bits; }
00173   int get_pack_index() const { return pack_index; }
00174   void inc_unpack_index(int n);
00175   uvm_packer* m_packer;
00176   bool m_use_metadata;

00179

00186 
00187 template<typename T>
00188 void pack_unsigned(const T& a, uvm_ml_packer_rep_int* rep) {
00189   unsigned nwords = (sizeof(T)*8 - 1)/32 + 1;
00190   rep->check_size(nwords);
00191   memcpy(&(rep->m_bits[rep->pack_index]), &a, sizeof(T));
00192   rep->pack_index+= nwords;
00193 }
00194 
00195 template<typename T>
00196 void unpack_unsigned(T& a, uvm_ml_packer_rep_int* rep) {
00197   unsigned nwords = (sizeof(T)*8 - 1)/32 + 1;
00198   memcpy(&a, &(rep->m_bits[rep->unpack_index]), sizeof(T));
00199   rep->inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00200 }
00201 
00202 static sc_strhash<void*> name_id_dict;
00203 static sc_phash<void*, std::string*> id_name_dict;
00204 
00205 unsigned uvm_get_type_id(std::string name) {
00206   char* c = (char*)(name.c_str());
00207   unsigned id = 0;
00208   void* pid = 0;
00209   if (name_id_dict.contains(c)) {
00210     pid = name_id_dict[c];
00211     id = (unsigned)(unsigned long)(pid);
00212     return id;
00213   }
00214   // not in dict
00215   id = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_type_id(name);
00216   pid = (void*)(unsigned long)(id);
00217   name_id_dict.insert(c, pid);
00218   return id;
00219 }
00220 
00221 std::string uvm_get_type_name(unsigned id) {
00222   std::string *name = 0;
00223   void* pid;
00224   // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
00225   // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
00226   // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
00227   // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
00228   pid = (void *)(unsigned long)id;
00229     name = id_name_dict[pid];
00230     if (name != 0) {
00231     return *name;
00232   }
00233   // not in dict
00234   char* nm = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_type_name(id);
00235   name = new std::string(nm); 
00236   id_name_dict.insert(pid, name);
00237   return *name;
00238 }

00244 ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::ml_uvm_packer_rep_int(uvm_packer* packer) {
00245   m_packer = packer;
00246   m_use_metadata = false;
00247 
00248   pack_index = 0;
00249   unpack_index = 0;
00250 
00251   size = 0;
00252   max_size = 0;
00253   m_bits = 0;
00254 }
00255 
00256 ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::~ml_uvm_packer_rep_int() {
00257   if (m_bits)
00258     delete[] m_bits;
00259 }
00260 
00261 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::allocate(int nwords, bool copy_) {
00262   // allocate new unsigned array with new size, and copy over contents from
00263   // old unsigned array
00264 
00265   unsigned total_elems = pack_index + nwords;
00266   unsigned old_size = size;
00267   size = ((total_elems - 1)/UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT + 1)*UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT; 
00268   // the calculation above is simply adding a chunk of 
00269   // UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT elements to the existing 
00270   // size; instead of doing that directly, we go thru the calcualtions in case 
00271   // (nwords > UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT), in which case more 
00272   // than 1 chunk will be added;
00273   
00274   if (size > max_size) { // need to allocate
00275     max_size = size;
00276     unsigned* new_bv = new unsigned[size];
00277     if (m_bits) {
00278       if (copy_) {
00279         memcpy(new_bv, m_bits, old_size*(sizeof(unsigned)));
00280       }
00281       delete[] m_bits;
00282     }
00283     m_bits = new_bv;
00284     return;
00285   }
00286 }
00287   
00288 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::set_bits(unsigned* bits, unsigned nbits) {
00289 
00290   unsigned nwords = ((nbits-1)/32)+1; // GL unsigned nwords = nbits/32;
00291   // check that we are in a "fresh" packer, e.g. one that has been reset
00292 
00293     ASSERT_ZERO(size);
00294     ASSERT_ZERO(pack_index);
00295   // no need to copy over from old sc_bv_base
00296   allocate(nwords, false);  
00297   memcpy(m_bits, bits, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
00298   size = nwords;
00299   pack_index = nwords;
00300 }
00301 
00302 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::reset() {
00303 
00304   pack_index = 0;
00305   unpack_index = 0;
00306   size = 0;
00307 }
00308 
00309 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::inc_unpack_index(int n) {
00310   unpack_index += n;
00311   if (unpack_index > pack_index) {
00312     char msg[1024];
00313     sprintf(msg,"unpack_index=%d, pack_index=%d",unpack_index,pack_index);
00314     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_,msg);
00315   }
00316 }
00317 
00319 
00320 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::check_size(int nwords) {
00321   int capacity = size - pack_index;
00322   if (nwords >= capacity) {
00323     allocate(nwords);
00324   }
00325 }
00326 
00327 // put a 8-bit 1 meaning non-null for uvm_objects
00328 
00329 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_non_null() {
00330   int i = 1;
00331   pack_unsigned(i, this);
00332   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_non_null " << endl;
00333 }
00334 
00335 // put 8-bit 0 meaning null for uvm_objects
00336 
00337 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_null() {
00338   int i = 0;
00339   pack_unsigned(i, this);
00340   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_null " << endl;
00341 }
00342 
00343 bool ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null() {
00344   int a;
00345   unpack_unsigned(a, this);
00346   if (!a) { 
00347     if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null FALSE " << endl;
00348     return false;
00349   }
00350   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null true " << endl;
00351   return true;
00352 }
00353 
00355 
00356 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_char(char a) {
00357   pack_unsigned(a, this);
00358   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_char " << a << endl;
00359 }
00360 
00361 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_char(char& a) {
00362   unpack_unsigned(a, this);
00363   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_char -> " << a << endl;
00364 }
00365 
00367 
00368 // after packing a string, pack a null byte at the end 
00369 
00370 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_string(std::string a) {
00371 
00372   int nchars = a.length() + 1; // length + terminating null char
00373   const char* cstring = a.c_str();  // cstring is null terminated
00374 
00375   // pack 4 chars in each slot, and pack a null char at end
00376   unsigned nwords = (nchars - 1)/4 + 1;
00377   unsigned nwords_minusone = nwords - 1;
00378   check_size(nwords);
00379   // first copy over nwords-1 
00380   for (unsigned i=0; i < nwords_minusone; i++) {      
00381 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00382     char c[4];
00383     c[0] = cstring[i*4+3];
00384     c[1] = cstring[i*4+2];
00385     c[2] = cstring[i*4+1];
00386     c[3] = cstring[i*4];
00387     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), c, 4);
00388 #else
00389     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &(cstring[i*4]), 4);
00390 #endif
00391     pack_index++;
00392   }
00393   // now copy over the remaining chars
00394   unsigned remainder = nchars - (nwords_minusone * 4);
00395 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00396   char c[4];
00397   for (unsigned i=0; i < 4; i++) {      
00398     unsigned index = nwords*4-i-1;
00399     if (index > (nwords_minusone*4+remainder-1)) 
00400       c[i] = 0;
00401     else
00402       c[i] = cstring[index];
00403    }
00404    memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), c, 4);
00405 #else
00406   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &(cstring[nwords_minusone*4]), remainder);
00407 #endif
00408   pack_index++;
00409 
00410   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_string " << a << endl;
00411 }
00412 
00413 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_string(std::string& a) {
00414 
00415   a = "";
00416   std::string cs;
00417   char c[4];
00418   while (1) {
00419     unsigned sz = 4;
00420     bool done = false;
00421     memcpy(c, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 4);
00422     inc_unpack_index(1);
00423 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00424     char tmp;
00425     tmp = c[0]; c[0] = c[3]; c[3] = tmp;
00426     tmp = c[1]; c[1] = c[2]; c[2] = tmp;
00427 #endif
00428     // check each slot if it is the null char 
00429     if (!c[0]) {
00430       sz = 0; done = true;
00431     } else if (!c[1]) {
00432       sz = 1; done = true;
00433     } else if (!c[2]) {
00434       sz = 2; done = true;
00435     } else if (!c[3]) {
00436       sz = 3; done = true;
00437     }
00438     if (sz > 0) { 
00439       cs.assign(c, sz);
00440       a = a + cs;
00441     }
00442     if (done)
00443       break;
00444   }
00445 
00446   if (print_pack_info_int) 
00447     cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_string: " << a << endl;
00448 }
00449 
00450 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name)
00451 {
00452   pack_non_null();
00453   pack_unsigned(uvm_get_type_id(type_name), this);
00454 }
00455 
00456 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is packed.
00457 // if metadata is included, then before packing the uvm_object, pack 2
00458 // additional items:
00459 // 1) 8 bits set to 1 if the uvm_object is non-null, and set 
00460 // to 0 if uvm_object is null
00461 // 2) the string name of the uvm_object, as returned by get_type_name()
00462 
00463 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj(uvm_object* a) {
00464   if (use_metadata()) {
00465     if (a == NULL) {
00466       if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj packing null" << endl;
00467       pack_null();
00468       return;
00469     }
00470     pack_non_null();
00471     std::string s = a->get_type_name();
00472     unsigned id = uvm_get_type_id(s);
00473     pack_unsigned(id, this);
00474   }
00475   if (!a) {
00476     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACK_NULL_,"");
00477     return;
00478   }
00479   a->pack(*m_packer);
00480   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj " 
00481     << a->get_type_name() << endl;
00482 }
00483 
00484 void * ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header() {
00485   std::string s;
00486   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00487     if (print_pack_info_int)
00488       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00489     return NULL;
00490   }
00491   unsigned id = 0;
00492   unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00493   s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00494   void *obj = NULL;
00495   string base_class_str;
00496   if (uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) {
00497     base_class_str = "uvm_object";
00498     obj = (void *) uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00499   } else if (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s)) {
00500     base_class_str = "tlm_generic_payload";
00501     obj = uvm_factory::create_registered_class(s);
00502   }
00503   else {
00504     char msg[1024];
00505     sprintf(msg,"Unpack %s failed. Type = %s",base_class_str.c_str(), s.c_str());
00506     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00507     return NULL;
00508   }
00509   return obj;
00510 }
00511 
00512 bool ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::check_obj_header() {
00513   bool result;
00514   unsigned unpack_index_sav = unpack_index;
00515 
00516   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00517     if (print_pack_info_int)
00518       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00519     result = false;
00520   } else {
00521     unsigned id = 0;
00522     unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00523 
00524     std::string s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00525 
00526     result = (((uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) || (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s))) ? true : false);
00527   }
00528   unpack_index = unpack_index_sav;
00529   return result;
00530 }
00531 
00532 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is unpacked.
00533 // metadata must have been packed during the corresponding packing
00534 // operation, as the packer allocates/creates the uvm_object from the
00535 // factory using the packed type name.
00536 // if metadata was not packed, then the packer errors out.
00537 
00538 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj(uvm_object*& a) {
00539   if (!use_metadata()) {
00540     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00541     a = 0;
00542     return;
00543   }
00544   std::string s;
00545   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00546     if (print_pack_info_int) {
00547       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00548     }
00549     a = 0;
00550     return;
00551   }
00552   unsigned id = 0;
00553   unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00554   s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00555   uvm_object* obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00556   if (!obj) {
00557     char msg[1024];
00558     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00559     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00560     return;
00561   }
00562   obj->unpack(*m_packer);
00563   a = obj;
00564   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj " << endl;
00565 }
00566 
00567 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic& a) {
00568   check_size(1);
00569   if (int(a.value()) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00570     m_bits[pack_index] = 1;
00571   } else {
00572     m_bits[pack_index] = 0;
00573   }
00574   pack_index++;
00575   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_logic " << a << endl;
00576 }
00577 
00578 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic& a) {
00579   if (m_bits[unpack_index] == 1) {
00580     a = sc_dt::Log_1;
00581   } else {
00582     a = sc_dt::Log_0;
00583   }
00584   inc_unpack_index(1);
00585   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_logic " << a << endl;
00586 }
00587 
00588 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base& a) {
00589   unsigned nwords = a.size(); 
00590   check_size(nwords);
00591 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00592   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), a.m_data, nwords*4);
00593 #else
00594   // m_data is protected in OSCI
00595   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) m_bits[pack_index+i] = a.get_word(i);
00596 #endif
00597   pack_index += nwords;
00598   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_bv_base " << a << endl;
00599 }
00600 
00601 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base& a) {
00602   int nwords = a.size();
00603 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00604   memcpy(a.m_data, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), nwords*4);
00605 #else
00606   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00607   for(int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) a.set_word(i, (sc_digit)m_bits[unpack_index+i]);
00608 #endif
00609   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00610   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_bv_base " << a << endl;
00611 }
00612 
00613 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base& a) {
00614   unsigned nwords = a.size(); 
00615   check_size(nwords);
00616 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00617   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), a.m_data, nwords*4);
00618 #else
00619   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00620   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) m_bits[pack_index+i] = a.get_word(i);
00621 #endif
00622   pack_index += nwords;
00623   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_lv_base " << a << endl;
00624 }
00625 
00626 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base& a) {
00627   int nwords = a.size();
00628 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00629   memcpy(a.m_data, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), nwords*4);
00630 #else
00631   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00632   for(int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) a.set_word(i, (sc_digit)m_bits[unpack_index+i]);
00633 #endif
00634   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00635   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_lv_base " << a << endl;
00636 }
00637 
00638 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base& a) {
00639 
00640   int nbits = a.length();
00641   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00642   check_size(nwords);
00643   if (nwords == 1) {
00644     int i = a.to_int();
00645     m_bits[pack_index] = i;
00646   } else {
00647     int64 i = a.to_int64();
00648     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &i, 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00649   } 
00650   pack_index += nwords;
00651   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_int_base " << a << endl;
00652 }
00653 
00654 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base& a) {
00655 
00656   int nbits = a.length(); 
00657   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00658   if (nwords == 1) {
00659     a = m_bits[unpack_index];
00660   } else {
00661     int64 i;
00662     memcpy(&i, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00663     a = i;
00664   }
00665   inc_unpack_index(nwords);  
00666   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_int_base " << a << endl;
00667 }
00668 
00669 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base& a) {
00670 
00671   int nbits = a.length();
00672   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00673   check_size(nwords);
00674   if (nwords == 1) {
00675     unsigned u = a.to_uint();
00676     m_bits[pack_index] = u;
00677   } else {
00678     uint64 u = a.to_uint64();
00679     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &u, 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00680   } 
00681   pack_index += nwords;
00682   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_uint_base " << a << endl;
00683 }
00684 
00685 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base& a) {
00686   int nbits = a.length(); 
00687   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00688 
00689   ASSERT_N_WORDS(nwords, 3);
00690 
00691   if (nwords == 1) {
00692     a = m_bits[unpack_index];
00693   } else {
00694     uint64 u;
00695     memcpy(&u, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00696     a = u;
00697   }
00698   inc_unpack_index(nwords);  
00699   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_uint_base " << a << endl;
00700 }
00701 
00702 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed& a) {
00703   unsigned nbits = a.length(); 
00704   unsigned nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00705   check_size(nwords);
00706   // the internal representation inside sc_signed is not exactly
00707   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00708   a.get_packed_rep(&(m_bits[pack_index]));
00709   pack_index += nwords;
00710   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_signed " << a << endl;
00711 }
00712 
00713 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed& a) {
00714   int nbits = a.length();
00715   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00716   // the internal representation inside sc_signed is not exactly
00717   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00718   a.set_packed_rep(&(m_bits[unpack_index]));
00719   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00720   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_signed " << a << endl;
00721 }
00722 
00723 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned& a) {
00724   unsigned nbits = a.length(); 
00725   unsigned nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00726   check_size(nwords);
00727   // the internal representation inside sc_unsigned is not exactly
00728   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00729   a.get_packed_rep(&(m_bits[pack_index]));
00730   pack_index += nwords;
00731   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_unsigned " << a << endl;
00732 }
00733 
00734 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned& a) {
00735   int nbits = a.length();
00736   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00737   // the internal representation inside sc_unsigned is not exactly
00738   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00739   a.set_packed_rep(&(m_bits[unpack_index]));
00740   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00741   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_unsigned " << a << endl;
00742 }

00750 uvm_ml_packer_int::uvm_ml_packer_int() {
00751   m_rep_int = new uvm_ml_packer_rep_int(this);
00752   m_rep_int->use_metadata(true);
00753 }

00756   delete m_rep_int;

00765 void uvm_ml_packer_int::use_metadata(bool b) {
00766   if (!b) {
00767     cerr << "WARNING: uvm_ml_packer_int use_metadata must be true. " 
00768       << "Ignoring attempt to set it to false" << endl;
00769     return;
00770   }

00782 
00783 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (bool a) { 
00784   int i = a ? 1 : 0;
00785   pack_unsigned(i, m_rep_int);
00786   return *this;
00787 }
00788 
00789 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (bool& a) { 
00790   unsigned aa;
00791   unpack_unsigned(aa, m_rep_int); 
00792   if (aa == 0)
00793     a = false;
00794   else
00795     a = true;
00796   return *this;
00797 }

00804   return *this;\
00805 } \

00807   unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); \
00808   return *this; \
00809 }

00863 
00864 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (uint64 a) { 
00865 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00866   // swap the two bytes before packing
00867   unsigned u[2];
00868   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00869   unsigned tmp = u[0];
00870   u[0] = u[1];
00871   u[1] = tmp;
00872   memcpy(&a, u, 8); 
00873 #endif
00874   pack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int);
00875   return *this;
00876 } 
00877 
00878 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (uint64& a) {  
00879   unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); 
00880 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00881   // the 2 words are swapped
00882   unsigned u[2];
00883   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00884   unsigned tmp = u[0];
00885   u[0] = u[1];
00886   u[1] = tmp;
00887   memcpy(&a, u, 8);
00888 #endif
00889   return *this; 
00890 }
00891 
00892 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (int64 a) { 
00893 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00894   // swap the two bytes before packing
00895   int u[2];
00896   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00897   int tmp = u[0];
00898   u[0] = u[1];
00899   u[1] = tmp;
00900   memcpy(&a, u, 8); 
00901 #endif
00902   pack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int);
00903   return *this;
00904 }

00906 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (int64& a) {  
00907   unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); 
00908 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00909   // the 2 words are swapped
00910   int u[2];
00911   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00912   int tmp = u[0];
00913   u[0] = u[1];
00914   u[1] = tmp;
00915   memcpy(&a, u, 8);
00916 #endif
00917   return *this; 
00918 }

00976 #define def_int_pack_sctype_operators(T) \
00977 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (const T& a) { \
00978   m_rep_int->pack_##T(a);\
00979   return *this;\
00980 } \
00981 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (T& a) {  \
00982   m_rep_int->unpack_##T(a); \

00988 def_int_pack_sctype_operators(sc_lv_base)
00989 def_int_pack_sctype_operators(sc_int_base)

00993 
00994 //template <> 
00995 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (const std::vector<bool>& a) {
00996   // first pack the size of the vector before packing its elements
00997   unsigned nbits = a.size();
00998   (*this) << nbits;
00999 
01000   // the bits need to be packed tightly in orer to map to
01001   // dynamic bit vector in SV or to list of bits in e. So
01002   // cannot pack each bit individually - instead map to
01003   // sc_bv and then pack sc_bv atomically
01004  
01005   if (nbits == 0) 
01006     return *this;
01007 
01008   sc_bv_base bv((int)nbits);
01009   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbits; i++) {
01010   bv[i] = a[i];
01011   }
01012   (*this) << bv;
01013   return *this;
01014 }
01015 
01016 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (std::vector<bool>& a) {
01017   a.clear();
01018   unsigned nbits;
01019   // first unpack the size of the vector before unpacking its elements
01020   (*this) >> nbits;
01021 
01022   // the bits need to be unpacked tightly in orer to map from
01023   // dynamic bit vector in SV or from list of bits in e. So
01024   // cannot unpack each bit individually - instead unpack to
01025   // sc_bv atomically and then map from sc_bv
01026 
01027   if (nbits == 0)
01028     return *this;
01029  
01030   sc_bv_base bv((int)nbits);
01031   (*this) >> bv;
01032   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbits; i++) {
01033     bool b;
01034     b = bv[i].to_bool();
01035     a.push_back(b);
01036   }
01037   return *this;
01038 }
01039 
01041 
01042 
01043 void uvm_ml_packer_int::set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
01044   set_bits(v->val, v->size);
01045 }
01046 
01047 void uvm_ml_packer_int::fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
01048   int nwords = m_rep_int->get_pack_index(); 
01049   v->size = nwords * 32;
01050   unsigned* bv = m_rep_int->get_packed_bits();
01051 
01052   // this mlupo is going over to the backplane and then onto the SV adaptor;
01053   // the SV adaptor is hardcoded to accept the max bits, hence allocate
01054   // max words here
01055   static int alloc_words = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words();
01056   
01057   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(v, alloc_words); 
01058   memcpy(v->val, bv, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
01059 }
